Source code for dummies_pycompss.constraint



[docs]class constraint(object):

    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
        self.args = args
        self.kwargs = kwargs

    def __call__(self, f):
        def wrapped_f(*args, **kwargs):
            return f(*args, **kwargs)
        return wrapped_f
